languages.text: "Одинокий Космический волк в недрах Комморры... абсурдная ситуация. Настолько, что у меня начинают возникать вопросы".
"A lone Space Wolf in the bowels of Commorragh... An absurd situation. So absurd that I am beginning to have questions."
languages.original_text: "Одинокий Космический волк в недрах Комморры... абсурдная ситуация. Настолько, что у меня начинают возникать вопросы".

traits.locale_text: "A lone Space Wolf in the bowels of Commorragh... An absurd situation. So absurd that I am beginning to have questions."
"A lone Space Wolf in the bowels of Commorragh... An absurd situation. So absurd that I am beginning to have questions."
"A lone Space Wolf in the bowels of Commorragh... An absurd situation. So absurd that I am beginning to have questions."
"A lone Space Wolf in the bowels of Commorragh... An absurd situation. So absurd that I am beginning to have questions."

languages.text: “一只太空野狼，孤身徘徊在科摩罗的腹地……这简直是太荒谬了，荒谬得令我难以置信。”
languages.original_text: "A lone Space Wolf in the bowels of Commorragh... An absurd situation. So absurd that I am beginning to have questions."

traits.locale_text: “一只太空野狼，孤身徘徊在科摩罗的腹地……这简直是太荒谬了，荒谬得令我难以置信。”

languages.text: « Un Space Wolf solitaire dans les entrailles de Commorragh... C'est tout bonnement absurde. Tellement absurde, d'ailleurs, que je commence à me poser des questions. »
languages.original_text: "A lone Space Wolf in the bowels of Commorragh... An absurd situation. So absurd that I am beginning to have questions."

traits.locale_text: « Un Space Wolf solitaire dans les entrailles de Commorragh... C'est tout bonnement absurde. Tellement absurde, d'ailleurs, que je commence à me poser des questions. »

languages.text: «Un Lobo Espacial solitario en las entrañas de Commorragh... Es una situación absurda. Tan absurda que me levanta numerosas dudas».
languages.original_text: "A lone Space Wolf in the bowels of Commorragh... An absurd situation. So absurd that I am beginning to have questions."

traits.locale_text: «Un Lobo Espacial solitario en las entrañas de Commorragh... Es una situación absurda. Tan absurda que me levanta numerosas dudas».

languages.text: 「コモラフの深部で孤独なスペースウルフが一匹…ふざけた状況だ。あまりの不条理に首をかしげたいね」
languages.original_text: "A lone Space Wolf in the bowels of Commorragh... An absurd situation. So absurd that I am beginning to have questions."

traits.locale_text: 「コモラフの深部で孤独なスペースウルフが一匹…ふざけた状況だ。あまりの不条理に首をかしげたいね」

languages.text: "Ein einsamer Space Wolf tief in Commorragh ... Eine absurde Situation. So absurd, dass ich mir langsam Fragen stelle."
languages.original_text: "A lone Space Wolf in the bowels of Commorragh... An absurd situation. So absurd that I am beginning to have questions."

traits.locale_text: "Ein einsamer Space Wolf tief in Commorragh ... Eine absurde Situation. So absurd, dass ich mir langsam Fragen stelle."

languages.original_text: "A lone Space Wolf in the bowels of Commorragh... An absurd situation. So absurd that I am beginning to have questions."

languages.text: "Commorragh'ın ortasında yalnız bir Uzay Kurdu... Absürt bir durum. Öyle absürt ki kafamda soru işaretleri oluşmaya başladı."
languages.original_text: "A lone Space Wolf in the bowels of Commorragh... An absurd situation. So absurd that I am beginning to have questions."

traits.locale_text: "Commorragh'ın ortasında yalnız bir Uzay Kurdu... Absürt bir durum. Öyle absürt ki aklımda soru işaretleri oluşmaya başladı."
